Description: Beech (?) wood mummy-label of Chaireis, decorated with a figure of Osiris.
Curator's comments: see bibliographic record. sacn plate Parlasca and Seeman 1999, no. 226). D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, p. 181.
